name: Valentin Wüstholz
description: Valentin is a researcher at Consensys Diligence. He has years of experience in developing tools and techniques that help us in producing more reliable and correct software. He received a Ph.D. in Computer Science from ETH Zürich and has been a lead developer for several software analysis tools. At Consensys Diligence, he focuses on various R&D efforts, including the Harvey smart-contract fuzzer, the Scribble specification language, and several specialized fuzzers for critical infrastructure.
